    Docstrings
    DICOM.@tag_str — Macro.
    @tag_str(s)

    Return the dicom tag, corresponding to the string s.

    julia> using DICOM

julia> tag"ROI Mean"
(0x6000, 0x1302)

    DICOM.lookup_vr — Function.
    lookup_vr(tag::Tuple{Integer,Integer})

    Return VR value for tag from DICOM dictionary

    Example

    julia> lookup_vr((0x0028,0x0004))
"CS"
